dmca.title: BSA Claims Infringement
dmca.body:
1. The copyrighted works at issue are Autodesk AutoCAD, Adobe Acrobat
as well as numerous other copyrighted works.


2. Search query on Google.com:

Infringing web pages in search results :


mastercam

http://www.zoomerart.net/index.php?target=desc&progid=5299

cheap software

http://www.cheap-software-megastore.com

http://www.trustnetmarketing.com

http://www.zoomerart.net/index.php?target=price

codegearbuilder

http://www.torrentreactor.net/search/codegear+builder+2007+crack

http://www.torrentportal.com/details/1618835/CodeGear+C%2B%2B+Builder+20
07.html

http://www.torrentportal.com/torrents.php

http://www.torrentz.com/22393dee94ce7962f82b8c5d2fad018d27252c2f

http://fenopy.com/torrent/CodeGear_C_________Builder_2007/ODE5MDE5/index.html

cracks

http://www.crack.ms

http://www.serials.ws


oem software

http://www.cheap-software-megastore.com

registration key

http://www.serials.ws/


serial numbers

http://www.serials.ws/



3. I can be contacted at [private]@bsa.org.


4. The above website does not provide a contact address.


5. Based upon BSA's representation of the copyright owners in
anti-piracy matters, we have a good faith belief that none of the
materials or activities listed above have been authorized by the
rightsholders, their agents, or the law.


6. BSA represents that the information in this notification is accurate
and states, under penalty of perjury, that it is authorized to act in
this matter on behalf of the copyright owners listed above.




_____________________________
[private]

Internet Investigator

Business Software Alliance

[private]@bsa.org <mailto:[private]@bsa.org>

[private]

*The Business Software Alliance (www.bsa.org) is the foremost organization dedicated to
promoting a safe and legal digital world. BSA is the voice of the
world's commercial software industry and its hardware partners before
governments and in the international marketplace. Its members represent
one of the fastest growing industries in the world. BSA programs foster
technology innovation through education and policy initiatives that
promote copyright protection, cyber security, trade and e-commerce. BSA
members include Adobe, Apple, Autodesk, Avid, Bentley Systems, Borland,
CNC Software/Mastercam, McAfee, Microsoft, Monotype Imaging, PTC,
Siemens PLM Software, SolidWorks, Sybase, Symantec, and The MathWorks.
